description.caption: Joining our team is simple and hassle-free! Follow these three easy steps to kick-start your journey as a Host-Hand or Bartender.

data.title: Apply Online
data.description: Submit your application through our quick and user-friendly form. Share a bit about yourself, your availability, and why you’re excited to join us.

data.title: Onboarding
data.description: Attend a short onboarding session where we’ll cover the essentials. You’ll learn what’s expected, get a quick overview of the role, and complete any necessary verification.

data.title: Start Earning
data.description: Once verified, you’re ready to go! Choose gigs that fit your schedule, show up, and start earning while helping hosts create unforgettable events.
